title: Trump aims to open nearly all U.S. offshore to drilling
text:
Trump aims to open nearly all U.S. offshore to drilling Thursday, January 04, 2018 - 01:58 
The Trump administration on Thursday proposed opening nearly all U.S. offshore waters to oil and gas drilling, a move aimed at boosting domestic energy production that sparked protests from coastal states, environmentalists and the tourism industry.   
The Trump administration on Thursday proposed opening nearly all U.S. offshore waters to oil and gas drilling, a move aimed at boosting domestic energy production that sparked protests from coastal states, environmentalists and the tourism industry.  //reut.rs/2CJB103
